apps.name: Dynos
apps.subtitle: Third-Party App for @usememos for iOS & Android
apps.localizedDescription:
Dynos is a third-party app for Memos. Create, Edit, Delete and View your Memos everywhere! (Even Offline!) 

Dynos requires a selfhosted instance of Memos. Please refer to the documentation for more information! Keep in mind that a HTTP connection to your Memos-Instance can be intercepted by others! 

Disclaimer: Dynos was developed as a personal project and partly for learning purposes. It is currently in a very bare bones state and full of bugs. Feel free to contribute on GitHub! <3
